name: Slob Dictionary Data File
summary: A SLOB file is a dictionary data file used by software that supports the Sorted List of Blobs (Slob) format, such as Aard 2 Dictionary and OSS-Dict. It stores dictionary or reference book content in a compact, searchable structure that organizes entries in a key-value structure, where each word or term acts as a key and the definition or associated content is the value. SLOB files also support Unicode , so it can store text in many different languages.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
